page.title: 16A.P. LEAMINGTON
page.content: The{A.P.Leamington}firm opened in Leamington Spa in 1920.There is,today, a work force of 4 500. The site extends over some 160 acres of which 74 acres is the factory;a sports ground covers 20 acres. There are many facilities for employees including a medical block and a number of sub-surgeries,canteen, sports ground and pavillion. The items manufactured here are classed as light engineering and the main products are brakes,clutches, automatic gearboxes,steering and suspension joints. The products are sent all over the World,but most of them go to Western Europe. A.P.Leamington imports specialist steel, mainly from West Germany.
